Class AbstractPushEvent

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.AbstractPushEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
HandleIdEvent
public abstract class AbstractPushEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an abstract implementation of a push event.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Method Detail

doPreOperationsHook

protected void doPreOperationsHook()
This method is called in the thread in which the operations are executed before all operations are executed. This method can be used to start a transaction E.g.: 
 DCtxt dctxt = (DCtxt)getVariable( "context" );
 dctxt.startTransaction( "PushServiceTransaction" );

Since:
2008.b

doPostOperationsHook

protected void doPostOperationsHook()
This method is called in the thread in which the operations are executed after all operations have been executed. This method can be used to close a transaction E.g.: 
 DCtxt dctxt = (DCtxt)getVariable( "context" );
 dctxt.finishTransaction();

Since:
2008.b
